definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: The laws of libel, privacy, and copyright still apply in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 关于诽谤，隐私和版权的法律也适用于网络空间。

sentences.english: "The big thing here is that there is nothing magic about cyberspace," Schneier says.
sentences.chinese: 这儿的大事是网络空间没有什么魔法。

sentences.english: At the same time the very shape of this network space shapes us.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，网络空间的这种特殊形式也塑造了我们。

sentences.english: It is no coincidence that the postmodernists arose in tandem as the space of networks formed.
sentences.chinese: 后现代主义者随着网络空间的形成而崛起绝非巧合。

sentences.english: The freedom to connect is like the freedom of assembly, only in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 连接自由如同集会自由一样，只不过它是在网络空间。

sentences.english: The freedoms to assemble and associate also apply in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 集会与结社自由同样适用于网络空间。

sentences.english: Take, for example, the threat of cyberspace conflict between states.
sentences.chinese: 以国与国之间网络空间冲突的威胁为例。

sentences.english: Therefore, the cyberspace is in many ways, an untamed frontier.
sentences.chinese: 因此，网络空间是在许多方面，一个蛮荒的边界。

sentences.english: It isno coincidence that the postmodernists arose in tandem as the space ofnetworks formed.
sentences.chinese: 后现代主义者随着网络空间的形成而崛起绝非巧合。

sentences.english: Once sent off into cyber space, images cannot be taken back.
sentences.chinese: 照片一旦流进网络空间，就不可能再从中拿出来。

sentences.english: Network storage space, there are time constraints, please download as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 网络空间存储，有时间限制，请从速下载。

sentences.english: I 'm very glad to get first space on net.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴第一次有了一个网络空间。

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Hu4 lian2 wang3 Xin4 xi1 Ban4 gong1 shi4
related.word: 国家互联网信息办公室
